description: Microsoft's initiative to enhance cloud and AI security through competitive engagement.

description: Discusses the most common and hazardous software vulnerabilities from 2023–2024, affecting over 31,000 disclosed vulnerabilities.

description: Highlights Microsoft's actions against a phishing service and seizure of 240 related websites to curb global cybercrime.

title: Fortinet VPN Flaws Allow Hidden Brute-Force Attacks
description: Discusses a newly discovered vulnerability in Fortinet VPNs, potentially hiding successful brute-force logins.
